# ğŸ¯ Core Objective

Teams must:
- Combine 2 unrelated concept cards
- Use AI tools meaningfully
- Build a functional concept prototype

âš ï¸ Coding is optional. AI usage is mandatory.

# ğŸ§  What This Event Tests

- AI fluency (30%)

# â³ Event Flow

## ğŸŸ¢ Phase 0 â€“ AI Orientation (5 min)
Quick demo on generating UI, simulating chatbots, and AI branding.

## ğŸŸ¢ Phase 1 â€“ Concept Selection (15 min)
Pick 2 random unrelated cards (e.g., Fitness Tracker + Virtual Pet).

## ğŸŸ¢ Phase 2 â€“ Structured Ideation (15 min)
Define product, audience, and key AI feature.

## ğŸŸ¢ Phase 3 â€“ AI-Powered Build (100 min)
Create prototype (Figma, Canva, Streamlit) and show proof of AI prompts.

## ğŸŸ¢ Phase 4 â€“ Enhancement Twist (15 min)
Adapt your solution to a surprise constraint.

## ğŸŸ¢ Phase 5 â€“ Pitch & Demo
2 min pitch + 1 min Q&A.

# ğŸ† Judging Criteria

- Creativity of Mashup (30%)
